praise_point: Follow up work done in five villages. House prayer meeting was started in many areas.
prayer_point: For the  place needed to conduct worship service at Rengapuram. Pazhani, Lakshmi, Mallika, Elumalai, Gajendran, Shanthi, Murthy, Kumar and Jeya Ganesh will know the love of Jesus Christ.

praise_point: Gospel was preached in six villages. Four persons were added into His fold. God protected Yesudian family from the two snakes in their house.
prayer_point: The churches compound walls will be constructed in Paramanandal, Melpappampatti, Thanda and Reddiyarpalayam.Sivagangai was beaten by her husband as she came to church, he should know the love of Jesus.

praise_point: Two villages were reached with the Gospel. God healed Muniamma from heart-ailment.
prayer_point: God to heal Marimuthu from cancer. Chinnamma family problems to be solved.

praise_point: 32 persons were added into His fold. Rubin's 8 year old son died but they are firm in their faith in Christ. Naresh, Vijay Kumar and Narendra are proclaiming Christ to others.
prayer_point: New Testaments in Mundari, Assami and Odisha languages to be available on the right time for distribution. Through the Jesus film ministry many people will come into the fold of Christ.

praise_point: In 15 villages, Gospel has been proclaimed as a result 17 persons were brought to the fold of Christ. God blessed Sushila with a child and healed Sukuram from asthma.
prayer_point: Healing of Rajkali from typhoid and Gyanmati from elephantiasis.

praise_point: Gospel has been reached in 13 villages. 260 people have accepted Jesus Christ as their personal Savior. Worship groups were formed in ten villages. God enabled us preach the Gospel in Lucknow, Sitapur and Harthodi areas.
prayer_point: Mansha Ram and Sunil Kumar who are willing do full time ministry.

praise_point: Gospel has been preached in 17 villages. Jesus film was screened in Tar and Murpur villages. Night meetings were conducted in ten villages.
prayer_point: : Arjun's family problems will be solved. Miracles and wonders will happen, for the people to know that Jesus is the living God.

praise_point: Gospel was preached in six villages. 35 persons have come to new life in Christ. God healed Jeyanthi from cerebral malaria.
prayer_point: Urmila and Rampiyari to accept Jesus Christ as their personal Saviour. Reshma who is suffering from severe headache for the last 20 years will be healed.

praise_point: Ten persons were added into His fold. God protected Bablu who met with an accident.
prayer_point: New believers to grow in their spiritual life.

praise_point: Six villages were reached with the Gospel. 33 people have yielded their lives to Christ. God protected Kishan from cobra snake bite.
prayer_point: Worship group will be restarted in Biloda village. Birarilal will know the love of Jesus Christ. Land needed to construct churches at Bawan and Sarsaul.

praise_point: 16 people have confessed their faith in Christ Jesus. Jesus film was screened in 8 places. Worship service at Ziroli village was restarted.
prayer_point: Worship group will be started over in Ecodia village and night meetings to be started in Uraikhata, Nagera and Baskhedi villages. Nanta will be healed from mental illness.

praise_point: Gospel was preached in four villages. 45 people have accepted Jesus Christ as their personal Saviour. Congregations were formed in two places.
prayer_point: Churches to be built in Pokhrayan, Sikandra and Gojapul areas.

praise_point: Three persons were added into His fold. God protected Legush from train accident.
prayer_point: Deliverance of Rajkumar from evil spirit. God's healing touch on Saradha from typhoid and Archana from epilepsy.

praise_point: Seven people have yielded their lives to Christ. God provided us a hand pump on our church land.
prayer_point: Deliverance of Jasvir Singh from alcoholism. Pappu Singh will find a suitable life partner.

praise_point: Survey work was done in Harish Chandrapur village among the people of Oraon.
prayer_point: Bada Tola, Gargari, Neemgachi, Kavamari, Thethel Bari, Baisa and Nam Nagar villagers will know the love of Jesus Christ. Parmil, a new contact to accept Jesus Christ as his personal Saviour.
